title: WTB:  AB 350 No Frame or AB 460 PSA 5+
author: sreader3

posts.post_title: WTB:  AB 350 No Frame or AB 460 PSA 5+
posts.post_content:
Looking for one copy of an American Beauty 350 No Frame or 460 for my backs collection.  Don't really care who is on the front.

PSA 5 would be ideal but I will happily take a 5.5, 6 or 6.5 (not really interested in 4s or 7s).  Will pay a respectable above-market premium.

Will also consider SGC 5.5 or higher.

PM or email to sarpc at qwestoffice dot net 

Thanks.

Scot Reader

EDITED TO ADD:  Forgot to mention that I have some very nice cards to trade--Old Judge to Topps and a lot in-between.
